title: Terri Sewell
deleted: Sewellâ€™s stance has been generally anti-drug. Although she supports scientific research to evaluate the medical use of marijuana, she does not support legalization of cannabis in Alabama. Sewell has a D rating from [[NORML]], and a score of 3 out of 6 from [[National Cannabis Industry Association]], regarding her voting record for [[cannabis]].<ref name="NORML16">{{cite web |title=2016 Alabama Scorecard |url=https://norml.org/congressional-scorecard/alabama |website=NORML |access-date=24 January 2020}}</ref><ref name="Cannabis2019">{{cite web |title=Congressional Scorecard |url=https://thecannabisindustry.org/ncia-news-resources/congressional-scorecards/alabama/ |website=The National Cannabis Industry Association |access-date=24 January 2020}}</ref>
